ygData.subject: Re: Dueling Tip
ygData.msgSnippet: I m just wondering i saw a Magician on the Mithandril Marr server the other day dueling a wizard.  The Magician was of the 13th level and the Wizard was of the
ygData.messageBody:
I'm just wondering i saw a Magician on the Mithandril Marr server the other
day dueling a wizard. The Magician was of the 13th level and the Wizard was
of the 9th level. The wizard won because of his quick spell casting. The
Magician had his pet out but the pet wouldn't attack. I am just wondering if
the Magician's pet can attack or kill a regular player in a dueling match?
So far the Magician guy told me that it wouldn't respond to him when he told
it to attack the 9th level Wizard.

(Curious Dueler!)
